text: Horsunlu railway station () is a railway station in Horsunlu, Turkey. TCDD Taşımacılık operates daily regional rail service from İzmir to Denizli, a total of seven trains a day in each direction. Horsunlu station was opened on 1 July 1882 by the Ottoman Railway Company. ==References== ==External Links== *TCDD Taşımacılık - Official site Category:Railway stations in Aydın Province Category:Railway stations opened in 1882 Category:1882 establishments in the Ottoman Empire Category:Kuyucak District
title: Horsunlu railway station
